sentences.en: Client Impersonation is only available for Extended Stored Procedures.
sentences.cn: 客户端模拟仅可用于扩展的存储过程.

sentences.en: Convinced of his own righteousness, he was the perfect impersonation of a man of rectitude.
sentences.cn: 他确信自己很正直，可以完美地扮演刚正不阿的人。

sentences.en: Either a required impersonation level was not provided, or the provided impersonation level is invalid.
sentences.cn: 指定的模拟级别无效, 或所提供的模拟级别无效.

sentences.en: Game brief introduction: The pirate of impersonation fearlessness, the detection enchant of the treasure hide!
sentences.cn: 游戏简介: 扮演无畏的海盗, 发现迷失的宝藏!

sentences.en: Gets impersonation level of the user described by this identity.
sentences.cn: 获取由该标识描述的身份验证服务.

sentences.en: How do I use programmatic impersonation?
sentences.cn: 如何使用可编程的模拟?

sentences.en: In fact, any low - quality paper to change image noise impersonation.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 任何矮质度的纸弛都可以堵住保持图像噪声举行模仿.

sentences.en: In fact, any low quality paper to change image noise for impersonation.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 任何矮质度的纸张都可以堵住保持图像噪声举行模仿.

sentences.en: Remove impersonation parameters and use current user context instead.
sentences.cn: 删除模拟参数并使用当前用户上下文.

sentences.en: Researches show that the protocol can not resist the key compromise impersonation attack.
sentences.cn: 研究结果发现,该协议不能抵抗密钥泄露伪装攻击.

sentences.en: SAKA protocol does not achieve key - compromise impersonation.
sentences.cn: SAKA协议不具有密钥泄露安全性.

sentences.en: The latter approach provides better performance because it avoids impersonation altogether.
sentences.cn: 后一种方法提供的性能更佳,因为它完全避免了模拟.

sentences.en: This is the recommended impersonation level for WMI calls.
sentences.cn: 这是为WMI调用推荐的模拟级别.

sentences.en: When should I use programmatic impersonation?
sentences.cn: 何时需要使用可编程的模拟?
